description: This file defines a custom permission class 'IsOwner' for a Django REST Framework project, managing object-level and request permissions based on user ownership.

classes.name: IsOwner
classes.description: Object-level permission that allows access only to the object's owner (instance.user).

methods.name: bool has_object_permission(self, request, view, obj)
methods.description: Checks if the request user is the owner of the object by comparing user_id with request.user.id.

methods.name: bool has_permission(self, request, view)
methods.description: Ensures the request is made by an authenticated user.

ctags.name: has_object_permission
ctags.pattern: /^    def has_object_permission(self, request, view, obj) -> bool:$/
